description.de: FS, schwere sechsachsige Elektrolokomotive der Reihe E.646 in grün-grauer Farbgebung mit Aluminiumzierstreifen, schwarzen Drehgestellen und großen Trittstufen, Ep. IV
description.en: FS, heavy articulated six-axle electric locomotive class E.646 in green/grey livery with aluminium embellishments, black bogies, big steps, ep. IV
description.fr: FS, locomotive électrique classe E.646, livrée verte/grise avec enjoliveurs en aluminium, bogies noirs, grands marchepieds, ép. IV
description.it: FS, locomotiva elettrica gruppo E.646, livrea verde/grigia con modanature, carrelli neri, scalette grandi, ep. IV
